task: Create a regular expression to validate an AWS IAM username which must start with a letter, contain only letters, numbers, and specific symbols (+=-,.@_), and be between 1-64 characters long

Create a JSON schema to define the structure for an AWS CloudFormation resource configuration, including required and optional fields
